summary: An intergalactic dog pilot from Sirius (the dog star), visits Earth to verify the rumors that dogs have failed to take over the planet.
cast: Molly Shannon|Liam Aiken|Kevin Nealon|Brittany Moldowan|George Touliatos|Patti Allan|Hunter Elliott|Mikhael Speidel|Benjamin Ratner|Peter Flemming|Paul Vogt|Brenda Crichlow|D. Harlan Cutshall|Chaka White|Nicola Anderson|Ted Friend|Susan Bain|Matthew Broderick|Delta Burke|Donald Faison|Cheech Marin|Brittany Murphy|Vanessa Redgrave|Carl Reiner|Flynn|Mallie|Defford|Lita|Lexi|Banner|Scandal|Motif|Imp|Odie|Willie|Valentino|Spirit|Keri Jo Chapman|D.J. Dierker|Mig Macario
title: Un perro de otro mundo
